DOC.brief_summary: In 50 Patients undergoing planned surgical procedure require central venous catheter diameter subclavian vein measure ultrasound 6 different condition .
DOC.brief_title: Influence Two Different PEEP Niveaus Trendelenburg Positioning Manoeuvre Subclavian Vein Diameter
DOC.detailed_description: In 50 Patients undergoing planned surgical procedure require central venous catheter diameter subclavian vein measure ultrasound 6 different condition . The condition 1. neutral positioning , PEEP 0 cm H2O , 2. neutral positioning , PEEP 5cm H2O , 3. neutral positioning , PEEP 10cm H2O , 4 . Trendelenburg position -20° , PEEP 0 cmH2O , 5 . Trendelenburg position -20° , PEEP 5 cmH2O , 6 . Trendelenburg position -20° , PEEP 10 cmH2O After measurement central venous catheter use measure central venous pressure .
DOC.criteria: Age > 18 year cardiosurgery neurosurgery write informed consent ECG : inus rhythm peacemaker kontraindications PEEP pulmonary disease hemodynamically instable patient pregnancy pulmonal Hypertension ejection fraction < 35 % severe valvular disease tricuspid insufficiency
